SELECT u.dep_name as 'depName' , u.user_name as 'userName',
DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time,'%Y') as statistic,
DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time,'%Y-%m') as statistic,
DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as statistic,
sum(s.score) as score FROM user as u,statistics_detail as s where u.user_id = s.user_id
AND u.dep_name = #{depName}
AND u.user_name = #{userName}
GROUP BY statistic ,u.dep_name,u.user_name
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time,'%Y-%m')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY s.score DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{currentPage}

SELECT u.dep_name as 'depName' , u.user_name as 'userName', a.*, b.calculate_score AS calculateScore, b.calculate_condition AS calculateCondition FROM scientific_info as a JOIN scientific_info_conf b ON a.project_type_id = b.project_type_id
AND a.project_type_name = #{projectTypeName}
AND a.rule LIKE concat("%",#{rule},"%")
ORDER BY a.project_type_id DESC
LIMIT page,limit
